Open Funding Pilot

Open Funding pilot weeknote

  • 📝 Weeknotes #1 - starting a thing
  • 📝 Weeknotes #2 - we made decisions
  • 📝 Weeknotes #3 - we made a new prototype

What is a weeknote?

Q - What’s a weeknote?

A - DXW describe it best in their playbook. Our take is these are a way to speak like a human to people who might be interested in the work we are doing - with all the challanges and fun that doing that brings. It’s a place to radiate our intent and gather feedback

Q - Why do you want to do that?

A - Working with the garage door up is so inviting. Being inviting is great. Hopefully these weeknotes have a bit of character to them - we hope you read and enjoy them.

Q - Who else has done them?

A - Loads of people. This is a copy of the Welsh Revenue Service (literally, we copied the code). Beyond that there is a whole community of people that do them. BERG are probably the OGs.

Q - How do I find out more?

A - About this project? email anna@ff.studio or eliot@ff.studio

A - About weeknotes? Probably Giles, but first buy his book.
